alert.note: Alert for Blair; Cambria (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 19 at 7:08AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF BLAIR AND CAMBRIA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. While snow accumulation is expected to be on the light side, the combination of snow coming down hard for a brief time and temperatures near freezing could result in icy spots early this morning, especially on elevated surfaces such as bridges and ramps. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 706 AM EDT, a band of heavy snow was near Nanty-Glo moving east at 35 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Ebensburg, Carrolltown and Hastings around 715 AM EDT. Patton around 720 AM EDT. Loretto around 725 AM EDT. Prince Gallitzin State Park, Cresson and Sankertown around 730 AM EDT. Gallitzin around 735 AM EDT. Horseshoe Curve around 740 AM EDT. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 26 to 32. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
